name: Scatterbrains
description:
Scatterbrains is now in beta / early access on PC. Your robot moves and performs actions using punch cards you select. Send your robot to survive missions in a world overrun by a horde of dangerous enemies.

  • Half Tabletop - Looks and plays like a board game, but no mess to clean up afterward! You and an AI opponent take turns using cards to control game pieces on the board. Customize your deck of punch cards between missions.
  • Half Arcade - Get to the top in 10 minutes or less. Race against the clock, and set your personal best speed run time. Character progress is saved as you unlock new ability cards.

PLEASE NOTE! In early access you are likely to encounter some bugs. Updates will be made in the coming months to fix these, incorporate feedback, and make other improvements. Thank you for your understanding!
